name: Kirby™ Battle Royale Demo
description: In this demo, Kirby enters a tournament against his toughest rival yet…himself! The demo allows players to try 3 battles in the single-player and multiplayer* modes. Try the Sword, Cutter, and Beetle ability, and transfer Meta Knight and coins as a bonus to the main game once the full version is purchased!
disclaimer:
*Additional games and systems required for multiplayer mode. Sold separately.

Game in 2D.

You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
